entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is mentioned as still squinting toward the stadium.

entities.name: stadium
entities.description: The stadium is where people are coming out of, according to Hagrid.

entities.name: people
entities.description: People are coming out of the stadium, as mentioned by Hagrid.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters and is mentioned as saying 'Good idea' to Hagrid's plan.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another main character and is mentioned as not believing Hagrid.

entities.name: giant
entities.description: A giant is mentioned in the forest, according to Hermione's concerns.

relationships.description: Hagrid is still squinting toward the stadium.
People are coming out of the stadium, as mentioned by Hagrid.
Harry is associated with Hagrid's plan to blend in with the crowd.
